title: Ticket #7390: Allow 1 startd to have starters in different BASE_CGROUPs
description:
LIGO would like to segregate low-latency jobs from batch jobs within the same startd. One thing this requires is to have different BASE_CGROUPs for different starters. We will implement this by setting the local name of the starter to the slot_type, if specified. This will allow ligo to configure condor as 

SLOT_TYPE_1.BASE_CGROUP=/htcondor/batch
SLOT_TYPE_2.BASE_CGROUP=/htcondor/lowlatency

And set the cpu.shares and other cgroup'isms in the intermediate cgroup directories.
